item: Imagine having your own classically trained private chef just for the night.
Imagine the convenience of going out, but with the intimacy of your own home.
Michael Anthony’s mixes relaxed style with complete professionalism and versatility in your kitchen.

Be treated like a guest in your own home with waiter service for you and your dining companions. Whether it’s a 4 star 8 course tasting menu or a delicious and healthy leave behind meal for you and your family, Michael Anthony’s meals always leave an impression.
